on reading compounds: 返済【ヘンサイ】repayment, reimbursement, refund, redemption
代返【ダイヘン】answer a roll call for another
kun reading compounds: 返す【かえす】to return (something), to restore, to put back, to turn over, to turn upside down, to overturn, to pay back, to retaliate, to reciprocate, to respond (with), to retort, to reply, to say back, to do ... back (e.g. speak back, throw back), to do again, to do repeatedly
返す返す【かえすがえす】repeatedly, to a tremendous extent
返る【かえる】to return, to come back, to go back, to turn over, to become extremely, to become completely
